title: Yes to Grapefruit Even Skin Tone Moisturizer SPF 15, 1.4 Fluid Ounce
description: Yes to Grapefruit formulations blend powerful fruit acids with ingredients proven to reduce hyper pigmentation,  correct skin damage and enhance radiance. Use the entire colleciton to help correct and repair acne scarring,  sun damage and age spots. We all have a few imperfections but that doesnt mean we have to keep em. Yes to moringa oil to boost radiance and natural sunscreens to protect skin.

title: Watts Beauty Mineral Multi Use Under Eye Concealer / Also Reduces Redness & Acne - Unscented and All Natural
description: This product is a creamy solid that is easy to apply, re-hydrates and heals as it covers.  Unscented and all natural under eye concealer. The perfect formula for hiding those dark areas around the eye prior to applying your new mineral make-up. Used to conceal bluish bruises,under-eye circles and mild red tones on the face. Brightens eye area to enable a fresh look all day long... Ingredients in this creamy solid also help to heal redness and pimples while covering them up.

title: 2 EYELASH SERUM - SELECT LASH (0.16 oz x 2 bottles)
description: Get longer and fuller eyelashes! Safer for sensitive eyes and much safer than eyelash extensions. Apply to your eyelashes twice a week. Start at the base and wiggle upward for the best results.
